data.title: Orlando Train Station: High-Speed Rail
data.meta_description: Book your ticket at Brightline’s Orlando Train Station today. Learn more about the station amenities, points of interest, transit connections & more.
data.text:
Airport Parking

Surface Parking Lots

Brightline Guests can take advantage of three new open-air surface parking lots adjacent to Orlando Station for only $20 a day.

Surface Lot 1 10734 Jeff Fuqua Blvd South (EPass, Sun Pass Plus Only)

Surface Lot 2 10412 Jeff Fuqua Blvd South (EPass, Sun Pass Plus Only)

Surface Lot 3 10168 Jeff Fuqua Blvd South (EPass, Sun Pass Plus Only)

Parking Garage C — RESERVE UP TO 365 IN ADVANCE

Start your journey with convenient parking at Orlando International Airport's Parking Garage C, situated next to Brightline Orlando Station. To view parking rates, click here. When you arrive at the airport, simply look for the blue signs directing you to Parking Garage C. Park in any open spot and then head to Level 5 to access the skyway bridge connecting you to the train station via a 5-minute walk. For guaranteed parking, reserve your spot ahead of time up to 365 days in advance — book here.

South Park Place Economy Lot

If Parking Garage C is full, don’t worry. Your next best option is the South Park Place Economy Lot. Roundtrip airport shuttles take you directly to Terminal C. Once at Terminal C, Brightline Orlando Station is a 13-minute walk away. For up-to-date parking availability, click here.
